LanguageData.ChronoSave_EnabledTooltip: When enabled, the game will automatically save at regular real-time intervals.
LanguageData.ChronoSave_IntervalTooltip: How often to create a chronosave, measured in real-world minutes. Valid range: 1-60 minutes.
LanguageData.ChronoSave_NumberOfSavesTooltip: The number of chronosave files to maintain. Once this limit is reached, the oldest saves will be overwritten.
LanguageData.ChronoSave_InfoText: Chrono Save creates automatic saves based on real-world time rather than in-game time. This ensures regular saves even when the game is paused or running at different speeds. Chronosaves are independent of the normal autosave system.
